entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny this morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 40%
